headline: Steve Schmidt: FNCs Tucker Carlson, JD Vance Pushing Fascism
author: Pam Key
sentences: It is contrary to the American idea and ideal as we understand it, which is, at long last, we stand at the edge of a moment when all people of all races and all religions and all ethnicity stand equally in this land before the law.

Because it treats everyone equally, his vote, their vote, a group vote, a group of people that look alike to them, white people who have a similar world view, their vote, their power in their view is lessened.

Vance and others is making, is this that American freedom, that American culture and that in order for it to be saved, we have to deal with the problem of American democracy.
And so therefore, democracy becomes the opposite of freedom because freedom cannot be something where they and people who are less than them are treated equally.
